```
cd k8s-specs

git pull

minikube start --vm-driver=virtualbox

kubectl config current-context  
```

```
kubectl create \
 -f ingress/go-demo-2-deploy.yml

kubectl get \
 -f ingress/go-demo-2-deploy.yml  
```

```
IP=$(minikube ip)

PORT=$(kubectl get svc go-demo-2-api \
 -o jsonpath="{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}")

curl -i "http://$IP:$PORT/demo/hello"  
```

```
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2017 13:35:26 GMT
Content-Length: 14
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8

hello, world!  
```

```
kubectl create \
 -f ingress/devops-toolkit-dep.yml \
 --record --save-config

kubectl get \
 -f ingress/devops-toolkit-dep.yml  
```

```
PORT=$(kubectl get svc devops-toolkit \
 -o jsonpath="{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}")

open "http://$IP:$PORT"  
```

```
- kube-dns: enabled
- registry: disabled
- registry-creds: disabled
- dashboard: enabled
- coredns: disabled
- heapster: disabled
- ingress: disabled
- addon-manager: enabled
- default-storageclass: enabled  
```

```
kubectl get pods -n kube-system \
 | grep ingress
```

```
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
 name: go-demo-2
 annotations:
 ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
spec:
 rules:
 - http:
 paths:
 - path: /demo
 backend:
 serviceName: go-demo-2-api
 servicePort: 8080  
```

```
kubectl create \
 -f ingress/go-demo-2-ingress.yml

kubectl get \
 -f ingress/go-demo-2-ingress.yml  
```

```

 -f ingress/go-demo-2-deploy.yml
```

```
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
 name: devops-toolkit
 annotations:
    ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
spec:
 rules:
 - http:
 paths:
 - path: /
 backend:
 serviceName: devops-toolkit
 servicePort: 80
...  
```

```
kubectl delete \
 -f ingress/devops-toolkit-dep.yml

 -f ingress/devops-toolkit.yml \
 --record --save-config
```

```
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
 name: default
 annotations:
 ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
spec:

 serviceName: devops-toolkit
 servicePort: 80
```

```
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
 name: devops-toolkit
spec:
 rules:
 - host: devopstoolkitseries.com
 http:
 paths:
 - backend:
 serviceName: devops-toolkit
 servicePort: 80
```
